info.title: LogicalModels Enumeration API
info.description: API endpoint providing an enumeration of all available Logical Model schemas

get.summary: Get enumeration of all Logical Model schemas
get.description: Returns a list of all available Logical Model schemas with metadata

schemas.title: WHO Vaccine PreQual DB
schemas.description:
WHO Vaccine PreQual DB.  Logical model for WHO PreQual DB as CSV file available at:
     https://extranet.who.int/prequal/vaccines/prequalified-vaccines
Columns of the CSV are as follows
  1:Date of Prequalification  
  2:Vaccine Type
  3:Commercial Name
  4:Presentation
  5:No. of doses
  6:Manufacturer
  7:Responsible NRA

schemas.title: WHO Vaccine PreQual DB with IDs
schemas.description:
Logical model for WHO PreQual DB as CSV file available at:
     https://extranet.who.int/prequal/vaccines/prequalified-vaccines
Columns of the CSV are as follows
with additional data fields for appropriately referencing associated data objects

EnumerationResponse.title: Logical Model Enumeration Schema
EnumerationResponse.description: JSON Schema defining the structure of the Logical Model enumeration endpoint response

url.description: Relative URL to the schema file

logicalModelUrl.description: FHIR canonical URL of the Logical Model

propertyCount.description: Number of properties in the Logical Model
